title: Miley Cyrus & Cody Simpson Kiss And Cuddle Using A Joker Filter & It’s Messing With Our Heads
text:
How are you prepping up for the Halloween 2019? We are sure you’ve all watched Joaquin Phoenix’s stellar performance in Joker? So, are you up for a picture in a Joker filter? How about engaging in some PDA while using the filter? That’s again unsettling, right?

Screengrab

Miley Cyrus who has recently been making headlines over her love life did the same. She kissed her boyfriend Cody Simpson, but she used the Joker filter which to be honest is messing with our heads.

Screengrab

Miley Cyrus shared the video as her Instagram story. The couple is lying in bed and playing around with the Joker filter.

Don't Miss 1.4 K SHARES 548 SHARES 3 K SHARES 856 SHARES 3.7 K SHARES

Meanwhile, Miley Cyrus and her love life is making headlines, especially after her divorce with Liam Hemsworth. She was rumoured to be dating Kaitylnn Carter. However, shortly after the rumours went viral, they parted ways. Now, it is said that Miley is dating Cody Simpson.

Meanwhile, romance is in the air for Liam Hemsworth too, who is reportedly dating Australian actress-model Maddison Brown. They were spotted kissing and hugging recently.

Liam Hemsworth and Miley Cyrus had called it quits on August 10. In an official statement, Miley had said, “Liam and Miley have agreed to separate at this time. Ever-evolving, changing as partners and individuals, they have decided this is what's best while they both focus on themselves and careers. They still remain dedicated parents to all of their animals they share while lovingly taking this time apart. Please respect their process and privacy.'”
description: Miley Cyrus who has recently been making headlines over her love life did the same. She kissed her boyfriend Cody Simpson, but she used the Joker filter which to be honest is messing with our heads. Miley Cyrus shared the video as her Instagram story. The couple is lying in bed and playing around with the Joker filter.
